record.name: Product Experts

body.text:
BUG UPDATE: The bug causing The Offsite proctor to shut down unexpectedly has been resolved!  Customers can update the firmware to resolve the issue.  Details can be found in this article and shared with customers.  

@Product Experts

messageSegments.text: How to resolve projector shutting down intermittently

header.text: How to resolve projector shutting down intermittently — Quentin Engineer to Salesforce Only

parent.name: How to resolve projector shutting down intermittently

record.description: Get product support from our experts
record.name: Product Experts

messageSegments.text: I need help troubleshooting an issue - my customer's projector is shutting down periodically.  It is not related to overheating.  Has anyone seen this before?

body.text: @Product Experts I need help troubleshooting an issue - my customer's projector is shutting down periodically.  It is not related to overheating.  Has anyone seen this before?

messageSegments.text: I've heard of this coming up with other customers too - we've seen an increase in case volume on this issue.

body.text: I've heard of this coming up with other customers too - we've seen an increase in case volume on this issue.

messageSegments.text: Thanks for the heads up team.  We'll get a bug created for this and provide an update ASAP!

body.text: Thanks for the heads up team.  We'll get a bug created for this and provide an update ASAP!

explanation.summary: Wanna rock your day? Salesforce Today is your one-stop place to review account and contact info before meetings, instantly join conference calls, quickly log events, and more.
